description: The Spindrift Knight, captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. Eula is a powerful physical DPS who excels at dealing massive burst damage.
info: Eula is the premier physical DPS in Genshin Impact, capable of dealing massive burst damage with her Elemental Burst. Build her for Physical DMG Bonus, CRIT, and ATK%.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework - Edel
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes with a claymore.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes with a claymore.
Charged Attack
Drains stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Icetide Vortex
skills.desc: Eula slashes swiftly, dealing Cryo DMG. Press: Deals Cryo DMG and gains a Grimheart stack. Hold: Consumes Grimheart stacks to deal AoE Cryo DMG and decrease opponents' Physical and Cryo RES.
skills.details_html:
Press
Deals Cryo DMG and gains a Grimheart stack (max 2).
Hold
Consumes all Grimheart stacks, dealing AoE Cryo DMG and decreasing opponents' Physical and Cryo RES.

skills.name: Glacial Illumination
skills.desc: Eula brandishes her greatsword, dealing AoE Cryo DMG and creating a Lightfall Sword that follows her around. The Lightfall Sword charges up and explodes at the end, dealing massive Physical DMG.
skills.details_html:
Glacial Illumination
Deals AoE Cryo DMG and creates a Lightfall Sword that follows Eula. The Lightfall Sword charges up and explodes at the end, dealing massive Physical DMG based on the number of stacks accumulated.

passive_talents.name: Roiling Rime
passive_talents.desc: If 2 stacks of Grimheart are consumed upon unleashing the Hold mode of Icetide Vortex, a Shattered Lightfall Sword will be created that will explode immediately, dealing 50% of the basic Physical DMG dealt by a Lightfall Sword created by Glacial Illumination.

passive_talents.name: Wellspring of War-Lust
passive_talents.desc: When Glacial Illumination is cast, Eula gains 1 stack of Grimheart.

passive_talents.name: Aristocratic Introspection
passive_talents.desc: When Eula crafts Character Talent Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Tidal Illusion
constellations.desc: Every time Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s. Each stack consumed increases the duration by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.

constellations.name: Lady of Seafoam
constellations.desc: Decreases the CD of Icetide Vortex by 10% and allows it to be used while sprinting.

constellations.name: Lawrence Pedigree
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Glacial Illumination by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Obstinacy of One's Inferiors
constellations.desc: Lightfall Swords deal 25% increased DMG against opponents with less than 50% HP.

constellations.name: Chivalric Quality
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Icetide Vortex by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Noble Obligation
constellations.desc: Lightfall Swords created by Glacial Illumination start with 5 stacks of energy. Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts have a 50% chance to grant an additional stack of energy.
